issue.title: [C++][Parquet] Improve bounds checking on some inputs
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-18253](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-18253). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In some cases we don't check for lower bound of 0, on some non-performance critical paths we only have DCHECKs, and while unlikely in some cases we cast from size_t to int32 which can overflow, adding some safety checks here would be useful.
